name: Be Great Partners
overview:
Be Great Partners is a leading startup incubator in Los Angeles with only one mission in mind: building successful products by investing in talented entrepreneurs. In addition to the capital, a turnkey office solution which includes world class office space, legal support, innovative in-house developers and most importantly influential mentorship.

Unlike other Incubators, BGP does things differently. We think different and we execute different. We bring the best people and business opportunity and develop them in house. We house a wide range of talent in house from developers to creative to marketing to legal.

Collectively our founding team has knowledge on creating successful startups for over a decade. We seek entrepreneurs who strive to be more than just good, who challenges good ideas so they can become great.

external_links.title: Los Angeles' Be Great Partners Joins the Trend of Hybrid Accelerators
